```{r}
require(leaflet)  
require(dplyr)

setview <- c(9.145000,40.489674)
mc <- data.frame(
  "name" = c("Melbourne","Auckland","Texel","Cartagena","Salzburg"),
  "lat" = c(-37.813629,52.370216,51.339695,6.244203,33.748997),
  "lon" = c(144.963058,4.895168,12.373075,-75.581215,-84.387985),
  "year" = c(2012,2013,2015,2017,2019),
  # "conference" = readr::read_lines("conference_talks.txt")
  "conference" = c(rep("ISEM2019",5))
)
# write.csv(mp,"/Users/malishev/Documents/Data/reveal_test/reveal_test/data/mp.csv")

library(leaflet)
library(geosphere) # for flight arc paths 

latlon_matrix <- matrix(c(mc[,"lon"],mc[,"lat"]),ncol=2)
custom_tile <- "http://d.sm.mapstack.stamen.com/((darkmatter,$00ffff[hsl-color]),(mapbox-water,$00589c[hsl-color]),(parks,$ff9a30[source-in]))/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"


par(bg="black")
colv <- "orange"
opac <- 0.5
site_names <- mc$conference
map <- gcIntermediate(latlon_matrix[1,],
                      latlon_matrix[2,],
               n=100, 
               addStartEnd=TRUE,
               sp=TRUE) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  setView(setview[2],setview[1],zoom=2) %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(mc[,"lon"],
                   mc[,"lat"],
                   radius = 10,
                   stroke = TRUE,
                   weight = 3, 
                   opacity = opac,
                   color = colv,
                   fillColor = colv,
                   popup=paste0("<br>",mc$conference,"<br>"),
                   popupOptions = 
                     popupOptions(closeButton = T,autoPan = T),
                   label=paste(site_names),
                   labelOptions = 
                     labelOptions(textsize = "20px",opacity = 0.5)
                   ) %>%
  # addProviderTiles(
  #   "CartoDB.DarkMatter"
  #   # "Stamen.TonerLite"
  #   ) %>%
  addPolylines(
               color = colv,
               opacity = opac)
map
# names(providers)

```
